revised_title: Hildebrand Wolfe Harvey: A Life of Dedication to Science and Quality
scientific_discipline: Biographies and Book Reviews > Marine Biology
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Hildebrand Wolfe Harvey, a dedicated scientist and educator who made significant contributions to the fields of marine biology and physical oceanography. Harvey's life was marked by a strong emphasis on quality and a commitment to understanding the complex interactions between the natural world and human endeavors, such as paint manufacturing. His work at the Marine Biological Association of the United Kingdom and his passion for science education left a lasting impact on the field.
